content: here s an easy beginner friendly crochet summer halter top this pattern includes an 7 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible this pattern includes us women s sizes xs-xxl any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #3 light weight/dk weight yarn i used lion brand truboo #3 light/dk weight yarn color pictured = mushroom crochet hook size 3 5 mm scissors yarn needle notes this crochet pattern is made as us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl this crochet pattern is made in two panels front and back panels are made the same this crochet pattern is made from the top down in this picture i have demonstrated with size small yarn needed 370 390 430 450 490 510 yards gauge blocked 16 5 double_crochet x 10 row = 4 measurements after blocked xs = 30 54 body circumference x 13 60 long s = 32 48 body circumference x 13 60 long m = 34 42 body circumference x 14 40 long l = 37 33 body circumference x 14 40 long xl = 39 27 body circumference x 15 20 long xxl = 41 21 body circumference x 15 20 long thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
